name: Online Appointment Booking System getmanagerregion.php文件SQL注入漏洞
product: ["Online Appointment Booking System Online Appointment Booking System 1.0"]
description: Online Appointment Booking System是一个网上预约系统。Online Appointment Booking System存在SQL注入漏洞，该漏洞源于文件/admin/getmanagerregion.php中参数city处理不当，攻击者可利用该漏洞获取敏感信息。
solution:
目前厂商尚未发布升级程序修复该安全问题，详情见厂商官网：
https://code-projects.org/
